short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your killboard experience by redirecting external zkillboard.com links to kb.evetools.org!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Links pointing to zkillboard.com pages will be redirected to kb.evetools.org or br.evetools.org where possible. Links on ZKillboard and Evetools are exempt.

Here are examples for each of the currently supported pages:
https://zkillboard.com/character/90361251/
https://zkillboard.com/character/90361251/kills/
https://zkillboard.com/character/90361251/losses/
https://zkillboard.com/corporation/1831131676/

https://zkillboard.com/corporation/1831131676/losses/

https://zkillboard.com/alliance/99005839/kills/
https://zkillboard.com/alliance/99005839/losses/

https://zkillboard.com/faction/500002/losses/
